00041 class YardNewEmployee: public wxWizard
00042 {
00043  public:
00044      YardNewEmployee(wxWindow* parent, int id = -1, const wxString& title = wxEmptyString, 
00045         const wxBitmap& bitmap = wxNullBitmap, const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition)
00046         :wxWizard(parent, id, title, bitmap, pos) 
00047     {
00048         wxXmlResource::Get()->Load("res/new_employee.xrc");
00049     }
00050     
00051     YardEmployeeType& GetEmployee() { return m_employ; }
00052     
00053   private:
00054     YardEmployeeType m_employ;      
00055 };
00056 
00057 class YardNewEmployee1: public wxWizardPageSimple
00058 {
00059  public:
00060     YardNewEmployee1(YardNewEmployee *parent) : wxWizardPageSimple(parent), m_parent(parent)
00061     {
00062         wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "NewEmploy1");
00063         m_first = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_FIRST")));
00064         m_middle = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_MIDDLE")));
00065         m_last = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_LAST")));
00066         m_taxid = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_TAXID")));          
00067     }
00068 
00069     virtual bool TransferDataFromWindow()
00070     {
00071         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetFirstName(m_first->GetValue().c_str());
00072         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetMiddleName(m_middle->GetValue().c_str());
00073         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetLastName(m_last->GetValue().c_str());
00074         
00075         wxString id = m_taxid->GetValue().c_str();
00076         id.Replace("-",""); // try to take out all dashes
00077         long lId;
00078         if (id.ToLong(&lId))
00079             m_parent->GetEmployee().SetTaxId(lId);
00080         else
00081         {
00082             wxMessageBox("The Tax ID must only contain numbers and dashes.", "TAX ID",
00083                             wxOK, GetParent());
00084             return false;
00085         }
00086         return true;
00087     }
00088 
00089  private:
00090     YardNewEmployee * m_parent;
00091     wxTextCtrl * m_first;
00092     wxTextCtrl * m_middle;
00093     wxTextCtrl * m_last;
00094     wxTextCtrl * m_taxid;
00095    
00096       
00097 };
00098 class YardNewEmployee2: public wxWizardPageSimple
00099 {
00100  public:
00101     YardNewEmployee2(YardNewEmployee *parent) : wxWizardPageSimple(parent), m_parent(parent)
00102     {
00103         wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "NewEmploy2");
00104         m_address = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_ADDRESS")));
00105         m_city = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_CITY")));
00106         m_state = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_STATE")));
00107         m_zip = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_ZIP"))); 
00108         m_phone = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_PHONE")));
00109         m_position = static_cast<wxComboBox*>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_POSITION")));
00110         
00111         map<string, string> acl;
00112         try {
00113             acl = wxGetApp().DB().ACLGetAll();
00114         }
00115         catch (YardDBException& e)
00116         { wxLogDebug(wxT("Could not load ACLs")); return; }
00117         for (map<string, string>::iterator it = acl.begin(); it != acl.end(); it++)
00118             m_position->Append(it->first.c_str());
00119                 
00120     }
00121 
00122     virtual bool TransferDataFromWindow()
00123     {
00124         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetAddress(m_address->GetValue().c_str());
00125         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetCity(m_city->GetValue().c_str());
00126         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetState(m_state->GetValue().c_str());
00127         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetZip(m_zip->GetValue().c_str());
00128         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetPhone(m_phone->GetValue().c_str());
00129         if (m_position->GetStringSelection() == "")
00130         {
00131             wxMessageBox("The position field must not be empty.", "Position",
00132                             wxOK, this);
00133             return false;
00134         }
00135         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetACL(m_position->GetStringSelection().c_str());
00136         return true;
00137     }
00138 
00139  private:
00140     YardNewEmployee * m_parent;
00141     wxTextCtrl * m_address;
00142     wxTextCtrl * m_city;
00143     wxTextCtrl * m_state;
00144     wxTextCtrl * m_zip;
00145     wxTextCtrl * m_phone;
00146     wxComboBox * m_position;
00147       
00148 };
00149 
00150 class YardNewEmployee3: public wxWizardPageSimple
00151 {
00152  public:
00153     YardNewEmployee3(YardNewEmployee *parent) : wxWizardPageSimple(parent), m_parent(parent)
00154     {
00155         wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "NewEmploy3");
00156         m_min = panel->GetSizer()->CalcMin();
00157         m_pic = static_cast<wxStaticBitmap *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_PIC")));
00158         m_sig = static_cast<wxStaticBitmap *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_EMP_SIG")));
00159                
00160     }
00161     
00162     void OnSig(wxCommandEvent& event)
00163     {
00164         m_sigloc = wxFileSelector(wxT("Select a signature file"), "", "",
00165             ".jpg", "*.jpg", wxFILE_MUST_EXIST, GetParent());
00166         
00167         wxImage sig(m_sigloc, wxBITMAP_TYPE_JPEG);
00168         if (sig.Ok())
00169         {
00170             sig.Rescale(200,50);
00171             m_sig->SetBitmap(sig);
00172         }
00173         else
00174         {
00175             m_sigloc = "";
00176             wxLogDebug(wxT("Bad image data."));
00177         }
00178     }
00179     
00180     void OnPic(wxCommandEvent& event)
00181     {
00182         m_picloc = wxFileSelector(wxT("Select a picture file"), "", "",
00183             ".jpg", "*.jpg", wxFILE_MUST_EXIST, GetParent());
00184         
00185         wxImage pic(m_picloc, wxBITMAP_TYPE_JPEG);
00186         if (pic.Ok())
00187         {
00188             pic.Rescale(128,128);
00189             m_pic->SetBitmap(pic);
00190         }
00191         else
00192         {
00193             m_picloc = "";
00194             wxLogDebug(wxT("Bad image data."));
00195         }
00196     }
00197 
00198     virtual bool TransferDataFromWindow()
00199     {
00200         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetSig(m_sigloc.c_str());
00201         m_parent->GetEmployee().SetPicture(m_picloc.c_str());
00202         return true;
00203     }
00204     
00205     wxSize GetMin() { return m_min; }
00206 
00207  private:
00208     wxSize m_min;
00209     YardNewEmployee * m_parent;
00210     wxStaticBitmap * m_pic;
00211     wxStaticBitmap * m_sig;
00212     wxString m_sigloc;
00213     wxString m_picloc;
00214     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00215       
00216 };
00217 
00218 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(YardNewEmployee3, wxWizardPageSimple)
00219     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_EMP_PIC_SELECT"), YardNewEmployee3::OnPic)
00220     EVT_BUTTON(XRCID("ID_EMP_SELECT_SIG"), YardNewEmployee3::OnSig)
00221 END_EVENT_TABLE()
